attr.title: Hammerwatch
attr.desc: Hammerwatch is a pixel-art hack-and-slash dungeon crawler where you battle through hordes of enemies, solve puzzles, and upgrade your character. Itâ€™s got a classic retro vibe, with different character classes, co-op gameplay, and tons of secrets to uncover. Think Gauntlet-style action with modern polish!
attr.inst:
This port is compatible with the 1.3 Steam release of the game.
Installing:
 - Open the Steam console and type in the following command to download the game files: 
download_depot 239070 239071 6038447391393479561
 - Put the gamefiles (without any surrounding folders) into hammerwatch/gamefiles/
